item.title: Exporting users from DBMail to Postfix lookup table
item.description: I wrote so many scripts the last couple of years that I can’t remember anymore… anyways, I was working on my mail server config today and found this little PHP script that exports users from the DBMail database to a Postfix lookup table, so that unknown users can be rejected upfront by postfix (thus reducing the load on the mail server). It also outputs a list of domains. #!/usr/local/bin/php <?php $mysqli = new mysqli("
